content.rendered:
“MORE CORD-CUTTING CONSUMERS
ARE TURNING TO ANTENNAS AND FREE OVER-THE-AIR TV”

– Consumer Report

With a variety of HD antennas currently on the market, watching full-quality local channels is now easier and cheaper than ever. Whether a consumer lives in a big city or out in the country these antennas are a great option if you want to tune into your local channels. HD antennas have been around for several years now, so there is a wealth of information out there to help you decide what would work best for you.

Below is an article from Consumer Report about their top picks of antennas.

CR’s Top HDTV Antennas

Techwalla: Highest Rated Outdoor HDTV Antennas

Close
